categories.polish: Polishing existing controls to target tier (Ch.5)

tasks.title: CSS Tokens (jsgui-tokens.css)
tasks.notes: All --j-* tokens: spacing, radii, shadows, typography, motion, colours (light+dark)

tasks.title: CSS Reset (jsgui-reset.css)
tasks.notes: Box-sizing + font-smoothing for jsgui-* elements

tasks.title: CSS Utilities (jsgui-utilities.css)
tasks.notes: sr-only, truncate, focus-ring, no-transition, no-pointer

tasks.title: Master Stylesheet (@layer cascade)
tasks.notes: jsgui.css with @layer: reset, tokens, legacy, components, utilities

tasks.title: Button: component CSS (6 variants × 5 states)
tasks.notes: primary, secondary, ghost, danger, outline, link variants with loading spinner

tasks.title: Button: icon + pill variants
tasks.notes: icon-only (square, tooltip), pill (full border-radius), toolbar (compact flat)

time_logs.notes: Test log entry

tasks.title: Button: full ARIA + keyboard
tasks.notes: aria-disabled, aria-pressed (toggle), loading state announcement

tasks.title: Button: micro-animations (hover lift, press, focus ring fade)
tasks.notes: Hover lift, active press scale, loading spinner, focus ring fade-in

tasks.title: Checkbox: component CSS + SVG checkmark
tasks.notes: SVG stroke draw-in animation, indeterminate dash, pop animation

tasks.title: Checkbox: card variant
tasks.notes: Clickable card wrapper with highlighted border when checked

tasks.title: Radio: component CSS + spring dot
tasks.notes: Custom circle/dot with spring animation, radio group layout

tasks.title: Radio: segmented control variant
tasks.notes: iOS-style segmented control with sliding active indicator

tasks.title: Toggle Switch: component CSS + spring thumb
tasks.notes: Spring-eased thumb, track colour transition, focus ring

tasks.title: Text Input: component CSS (3 variants)
tasks.notes: Outline, filled, underline variants with validation states

tasks.title: Text Input: floating label variant
tasks.notes: Label inside field floats up on focus using :placeholder-shown

tasks.title: Slider/Range: modern CSS + range + keyboard
tasks.notes: Full rewrite: CSS vars, range mode (two thumbs), steps, tick marks, ARIA, touch

tasks.title: Progress Bar: custom visual + indeterminate + striped
tasks.notes: Replace native <progress>, add indeterminate shimmer, striped animated, colour variants

tasks.title: Color Swatch: checkerboard + border + tooltip
tasks.notes: Checkerboard behind alpha, border for light colours, tooltip with hex

tasks.title: Panel/Card: component CSS + glass variant
tasks.notes: Default, elevated, glass, flat variants with header/body/footer sections

time_logs.notes: Created panel.css (8 variants incl glass), updated panel.js with jsgui-panel classes and data-variant attrs

tasks.title: Window: snap zones, z-order, animate maximize
tasks.notes: macOS-traffic-light, win32-classic, glass, floating variants. Snap, z-order, dbl-click maximize

time_logs.notes: Dark mode glass variant dark focus ring dragging state

tasks.title: Tab Control: animated indicator + closable + overflow
tasks.notes: Sliding underline, underline/pill/boxed/vertical variants, closable tabs, overflow scroll arrows

tasks.title: Grid/Table: column resize + sort indicators + virtual scroll
tasks.notes: Column resize, reorder, frozen columns, row expansion, selection, sort arrows, virtual scrolling

time_logs.notes: Dark mode row selection striped dark variant empty state

tasks.title: List: multi-select + virtual rendering + reorder
tasks.notes: Ctrl/Shift-click, virtual rendering, drag-to-reorder, ARIA listbox

tasks.title: Combo Box: searchable + multi-select + chips
tasks.notes: Type-to-filter, clear button, chips for multi-select, group headers, ARIA combobox

tasks.title: Scrollbar: thin macOS-style + overlay
tasks.notes: Thin overlay, arrow buttons, page click on track, smooth scroll

tasks.title: Tree View: icons + checkbox + keyboard nav + indent guides
tasks.notes: Node icons, checkbox selection (tri-state), search/filter, drag-reorder, lazy loading

tasks.title: Menu: context-menu + icons + submenus + keyboard
tasks.notes: Context-menu, dropdown, Win32 variants. Separators, icons, shortcuts, checkable, submenus

tasks.title: Splitter: collapse + min/max + hover style
tasks.notes: Double-click to reset, min/max pane sizes, collapse button, cursor feedback

tasks.title: Toolbar: separators + overflow + grip
tasks.notes: Separators, overflow menu (»), grip for drag, toggleable buttons

tasks.title: Search_Bar: clear, debounce, autocomplete, icon
tasks.notes: Clear button, search icon, debounced input, loading state, autocomplete dropdown

time_logs.notes: Rewrote search-bar.js with icon input clear button events, created search-bar.css

tasks.title: Tooltip: positioning, arrow, collision detection
tasks.notes: Fixed positioning logic, CSS arrow, viewport collision flip, rich content, delay, theme tokens

time_logs.notes: Extracted tooltip CSS to external file with design tokens

tasks.title: Toast: slide animation, positioning, timer bar
tasks.notes: Slide-in/out, position control, auto-dismiss timer bar, icons, stacking, pause on hover

time_logs.notes: Built toast.css with status variants position presets updated toast.js

tasks.title: Badge: colour variants, dot, pill, pulse, max value
tasks.notes: primary/success/warning/danger, dot-only, pill shape, pulse animation, 99+, positioning helper

time_logs.notes: Starting Badge CSS implementation
Built badge.css (10 colour variants, dot, pulse, sizes, positioned overlay), updated badge.js with themeable, data attrs, max-value, set_variant/set_pulse methods

tasks.title: Chip: dismiss, selectable, avatar, variants
tasks.notes: Dismissible, clickable selection, avatar/icon slot, colour variants, outlined, disabled

time_logs.notes: Built chip.css with 8 colour variants sizes avatar outline chip-group and updated chip.js with themeable data-attrs

tasks.title: Skeleton_Loader: shape variants + presets
tasks.notes: Text line, circle, rectangle, card shapes. Avatar+text combo preset. Reduced motion support

time_logs.notes: Created skeleton.css with design tokens, added jsgui-skeleton class and data-variant

tasks.title: Progress_Bar: custom styling + indeterminate + striped
tasks.notes: Custom visual (not native), indeterminate shimmer, striped animated, colour variants, labels

time_logs.notes: Built progress.css and rewrote progress_bar.js as div-based with variants sizes striped animated indeterminate label

tasks.title: Spinner: sizes, colours, overlay mode
tasks.notes: xs/sm/md/lg/xl sizes, inherit colour, overlay mode, loading label, reduced-motion fallback

time_logs.notes: Created spinner.css with 5 sizes 5 variants overlay mode, added jsgui-spinner class

tasks.title: Avatar: fallback initials, status dot, group stack
tasks.notes: Fallback initials from name, status indicator (online/away/busy), sizes, group layout, random colour

time_logs.notes: Created avatar.css with 5 sizes shapes status dots avatar group, added jsgui-avatar class

tasks.title: File_Upload: drag-drop zone, preview, progress
tasks.notes: Drag-drop zone with dashed border, file preview thumbnails, remove button, progress per file

time_logs.notes: CSS with dropzone drag-over file list compact mode

tasks.title: Rating_Stars: half-star precision, keyboard, readonly
tasks.notes: Half-star precision, keyboard navigation, readonly display mode

time_logs.notes: CSS with sizes colours half-stars, added jsgui-rating class

tasks.title: Data_Table: column resize, sort indicators, empty/loading states
tasks.notes: Column resize/reorder, sticky columns, row expansion, empty state, loading skeleton, bulk select

time_logs.notes: CSS with sticky header sort indicators striped bordered compact

tasks.title: Tree_View: checkbox selection, keyboard nav, lazy loading
tasks.notes: Tri-state checkboxes, keyboard nav, search/filter, context menu, indent guides

time_logs.notes: CSS with expand collapse indent icons selection hover

tasks.title: Horizontal_Slider: full rewrite (CSS, range, ARIA, touch)
tasks.notes: Ground-up rebuild: CSS custom properties, range mode, step snapping, tick marks, ARIA, touch

time_logs.notes: CSS with track thumb grab hover glow, added jsgui-slider class

tasks.title: Tabbed_Panel: animated indicator, closable, overflow
tasks.notes: Sliding underline indicator, closable tabs, overflow scroll arrows, lazy content, keyboard nav

time_logs.notes: CSS with underline pills card vertical variants, added jsgui-tabs class

tasks.title: Window: snap zones, z-order, animate maximize
tasks.notes: Snap-to-edge, z-order management, animated maximize, cascade positioning, double-click title bar

time_logs.notes: CSS with title bar glass variant macOS chrome dock states

tasks.title: Modal: animation, focus trap, backdrop click, sections
tasks.notes: Fade+scale animation, backdrop dismiss, Escape key, focus trap, header/body/footer, scroll lock

time_logs.notes: Full rewrite: overlay header body footer sizes close API escape key

tasks.title: Accordion: chevron animation, exclusive mode, keyboard
tasks.notes: Chevron rotation, exclusive mode (one section open), body height animation, disabled, keyboard

time_logs.notes: CSS with chevron flush variant, added jsgui-accordion class

tasks.title: Breadcrumbs: custom separator, overflow truncation
tasks.notes: Custom separator, overflow truncation to '...', icon support, current page non-clickable

time_logs.notes: CSS with separator hover arrow variant sizes, added jsgui-breadcrumbs class

tasks.title: Split_Pane: collapse, min/max, hover style
tasks.notes: Double-click collapse, min/max pane enforcement, divider hover style, nested splits, persistence

time_logs.notes: CSS with drag handles grip indicator horizontal vertical

tasks.title: Rich_Text_Editor: undo/redo, tables, images, code blocks
tasks.notes: Undo/redo history, table insertion, image insert/upload, placeholder, blockquote, code blocks

time_logs.notes: Built Rich_Text_Editor with toolbar markdown mode external CSS jsgui-rte class

tasks.title: Color_Picker: preset swatches, clipboard, eyedropper
tasks.notes: Preset palette row, click-to-copy hex, EyeDropper API, opacity slider, compact dropdown mode

time_logs.notes: External CSS with dark mode minimized inline CSS verified wheel/hex/palette

tasks.title: Sidebar Navigation (new control)
tasks.notes: Collapsible vertical nav: icon+label+badge, collapse-to-icon mode, active indicator, nested sections

time_logs.notes: Sidebar Nav with collapse nested items icons badges dark mode CSS

tasks.title: Wizard / Multi-Step Form (new control)
tasks.notes: Progress bar, step validation, back/next/skip, content swap, completed checkmarks

time_logs.notes: Wizard with step indicators connectors prev/next validation dark mode CSS

tasks.title: Inline Cell Editing for Data_Table (new feature)
tasks.notes: Click cell to edit, text/select/number/date editors, tab nav, dirty indicator, commit animation

time_logs.notes: Click-to-edit cell with text/number/select/date types save/cancel keyboard nav

tasks.title: Command Palette (new control)
tasks.notes: Ctrl+K overlay, fuzzy search, categorised results, keyboard navigation, recent/frequent

tasks.title: Notification Center (new control)
tasks.notes: Slide-in panel, grouped by time, read/unread, actions, clear-all, dismiss animation

tasks.title: Image Gallery / Carousel (new control)
tasks.notes: Carousel/grid/masonry modes, lightbox overlay, thumbnails, autoplay, slide/fade/zoom transitions

tasks.title: Timeline (new control)
tasks.notes: Vertical/horizontal, alternating cards, coloured dots with icons, connector lines, scroll animate

tasks.title: Kanban Board (new control)
tasks.notes: Columnar drag-drop, WIP limits, card tags/avatar/priority, compact mode, cross-column drag

tasks.title: Bar Chart (new control)
tasks.notes: Vertical/horizontal, stacked, rounded corners, animated grow, tooltip, grid lines

time_logs.notes: SVG bar chart with gridlines labels values click events dark mode

tasks.title: Pie / Donut Chart (new control)
tasks.notes: SVG segments, donut mode, segment hover expand, center label, legend, rotate-in animation

time_logs.notes: SVG pie/donut chart with labels legend click events

tasks.title: Sparkline (new control)
tasks.notes: Tiny inline SVG chart, gradient fill, final dot highlight, 80×24px default

time_logs.notes: Inline SVG sparkline with fill and endpoint dot

tasks.title: Area Chart (extends Line_Chart)
tasks.notes: Filled line chart with gradient below, extends Line_Chart engine

tasks.title: Gauge / Radial Progress (new control)
tasks.notes: SVG arc, animated needle sweep, colour thresholds, center number, arc/ring styles

tasks.title: Scatter Plot (new control)
tasks.notes: Multi-dataset points, tooltip, zoom+pan, trend line (linear/polynomial)

tasks.title: Heatmap (new control)
tasks.notes: Grid of coloured cells (GitHub contribution style), colour scale, tooltip, cell radius

tasks.title: Markdown Viewer (new control)
tasks.notes: Parse + style markdown, syntax highlighting, blockquote accent, table styling, wrap marked/markdown-it

time_logs.notes: Markdown viewer with built-in parser code blocks blockquotes GitHub/minimal themes

tasks.title: Code Editor (new control, wrap CodeMirror)
tasks.notes: Wrap CodeMirror 6, syntax highlighting, line numbers, active line, brackets, theme integration

tasks.title: Image Cropper (new control)
tasks.notes: Draggable crop rect, darkened outside, corner/edge handles, aspect ratio, zoom slider

tasks.title: Map View (new control, wrap Leaflet)
tasks.notes: Wrap Leaflet/Mapbox, markers, popups, dark/light map style matching jsgui theme

tasks.title: Diff Viewer (new control)
tasks.notes: Split/unified diff display, red/green highlighting, line numbers, scrollbar sync

tasks.title: Calendar Scheduler (new control)
tasks.notes: Day/week/month views, draggable events, time grid, slot click to create, event resize

tasks.title: Flow / Diagram Editor (new control)
tasks.notes: SVG canvas, nodes (rect/circle), curved Bezier edges, drag to reposition, port connections
